name: Brandix Screwdriver
info: This automatic screwdriver comes with 24 various screwdriver and drill bits, a convenient carrying case, and a charging cord, so you can be sure your mini drill is always charged and ready to go.

name: Rotary Hammer Drill
info: This hammer drill reduces vibration felt by the user at the handles, compared to rotary hammers without this feature.

name: WORX WX801L Mini-Cutter
info: Cutting disc, compact for one hand operation.Includes 3 cutting discs and 1 grinding disc. Versatile cutting tool - power to cut metal, tile, thin concrete and plastic

name: Adjustable wrench
info: Durable chrome vanadium construction is super sturdy.ProTouch grip provides maximum torque and comfort and is slip resistant.Wrenches have English and metric scales, extra-wide capacity, and a hang hole for easy wall storage.

name: Chainsaw
info: Husqvarna 20-inch 450 Rancher gas chainsaw is ideal for tasks such as tree pruning, yard cleanups and firewood cutting. 3.2-HP X-Torq engine reduces both fuel consumption and gasoline emissions

name: Circular saw
info: Power - Brushless motor of DEWALT 7 1/4 circular saw provides 5500RPM maintaining speed under load. Runtime - The cordless circular saw provides 330 crosscuts in 2x4 (pine)
